for i in range(input()):
    no=0
    count=0
    n=input()
    l=map(int,raw_input().split())
    elements=set(l)
    for x in elements:
        c=l.count(x)
        if c>count:
            no=x
            count=c
        elif c==count:
            if x<no:
                no=x
            else:
                pass
        else:
            continue
    print no,count
